content.rendered:
HELLO,

WE'RE DYMECH

PROJECT PORTFOLIO
A FEW THINGS

ABOUT DYMECH & OUR TEAM

Dymech Engineering is committed to meeting it’s clients’ specialized design, custom fabrication and engineering needs by developing effective, practical, turn key solutions. Established in 1998, Dymech has taken on hundreds of projects in the Ottawa region, and beyond. Check out our portfolio link for a small sample of what we can do.

ENGINEERING AND OFFICE STAFF

TOM VAN HUMBECK
Sr. VP of Engineering and Development, Founder

B.Eng. (Carleton University), P.Eng

MARK HARTLEY
President

B.Eng. (Carleton University)

MAT MAIN
VP of Corporate Development, Project Manager

B.Eng. (Carleton University), P.Eng

CWB Welding Supervisor 47.1, 47.2

MIKE SUROWIEC
VP of Resource Development, Project Manager

B.Eng. (Michigan Technological University)

CWB Welding Supervisor 47.1

CINDY DERZAI
Office & Accounts Manager

Certified Quickbooks ProAdvisor, Previous Owner "By the Book Administrative Services".

MELANIE OUELLETTE
Production Coordinator, Shipping & Receiving
MIKE BRAVO
Director of Business Development, Project Manager

B.Eng. (Carleton University)

MARTIN COURSOL
Project Manager, Mechanical Engineer

B.Eng. (Carleton University), P.Eng.

OLIVER RICHARDS
Project Manager, Engineer

B.ASc. (Queen's University), P.Eng.

SYLVAIN COSSETTE
Project Coordinator, Mechanical Designer

Mechanical Engineering Technology (La Cité), B.Eng. (Lakehead University)

JOHN MACAULAY
Project Coordinator, Mechanical Designer

Engineering Technologist (Humber College), Motive Power Technician (Algonquin College)

WELDERS, FABRICATORS, AND SHOP STAFF

DON DURANT
Shop Manager, Senior Welder & Fabricator

CWB Welding Supervisor 47.1

JOE TORRES
Site Supervisor, Senior Fabricator & Installer
BRYAN CLARK
Senior Welder & Fabricator

CWB Level 1 Weld Inspector/Supervisor

IAN PRATT
Senior Welder & Fabricator

Swagelok Certified Tube Fitter, Red Seal Welder

SYLVAIN CLEROUX
Senior Welder & Fabricator
TYSON COBB
Senior Welder & Fabricator
PAUL ATKINSON
Welder & Fabricator
DAVIN NADEAU
Welder & Fabricator
JOSH SABOURIN
Welder & Fabricator
ZACH PEDERSEN
Welder & Fabricator
STEPHANE CLEROUX
General Labourer
